document.full_text: world record holder jessica hardy has been cleared to compete at the 2012 london olympics if she qualifies for the united states team, her attorney said in a statement on thursday.
document.title: jessica hardy cleared to compete at london olympics
lines_and_colors: world record holder jessica hardy has been cleared to compete at the 2012 london olympics if she qualifies for the united states team, her attorney said in a statement on thursday.
